title: Zero Trust Security for Distributed Applications with Dapr Open Source
author: Alice Gibbons
description: Dapr improves the zero trust security posture of distributed systems out of the box by assigning application identities to all apps, ensuring that mTLS is enabled by default for all interservice and infrastructure communication.
cntitle: 使用 Dapr 开源实现分布式应用程序的零信任安全
cndescription: Dapr 通过为所有应用程序分配应用程序标识，并确保默认情况下为所有服务间和基础设施通信启用 mTLS，从而改善了分布式系统的零信任安全态势。
